authenticationError.message: Request is missing required authentication credential.
authenticationError.details: The access token is invalid or has expired.

invalidRefreshToken.error_description: Token has been expired or revoked.

rateLimitError.message: Quota exceeded for quota metric 'Read requests' and limit 'Read requests per minute per project'.

permissionDeniedError.message: The caller does not have permission to access customer.
permissionDeniedError.details: User does not have access to the requested customer account.

invalidCustomerIdError.details: The customer ID '0000000000' is invalid or does not exist.

developerTokenError.details: Your developer token is pending approval or has been rejected.

internalServerError.details: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

badGatewayError.details: Error connecting to Google Ads API.

timeoutError.details: The request took too long to complete.

invalidDateRangeError.details: Start date must be before end date.

queryTooComplexError.message: The GAQL query is too complex.
queryTooComplexError.details: Please simplify your query or reduce the date range.

customerNotFoundError.message: The requested customer was not found.
customerNotFoundError.details: Customer ID does not exist or you don't have access.

accountSuspendedError.message: The customer account has been suspended.
accountSuspendedError.details: This account is suspended and cannot be accessed.
